Title: gaja
Overview: A cat and mouse chase ensues between Gaja and a rival faction leader over a few startling events. Gaja tries to protect his friend, Krishna, and his lover, Shwetha, who are being targeted.

Title: Minchina Ota
Overview: The Movie deals with Bhadra (Sriimurali) living in a slum,He group has rivalry with another group headed by Vijay (Vijay Raghavendra) a middle class Guy,they Both love a City girl (Raai Laxmi), their rivalry intesifies with the girl choosing bhadra over vijay.

Title: Vamshi
Overview: An aspiring police officer and trainee Vamshi (Puneeth Rajkumar) is impulsive and aggressive in his ways, with even a little thing unleashing gruesome anger in him. This attitude costs him his dream, as he fails his interview when the panel realizes that he is too compulsive. However, there is a past that warrants for this behavior of his. When he is rejected by the Police academy, he joins his late father`s gang and becomes a goon. This, he doesn`t realize until later, distance him from his mother and lady love. Understanding their importance, when he tries to walk back from the path of violence and immorality, his henchmen do not let him. Will he be able to reform his life for his, and his family`s sake?

Title: Mr. Garagasa
Overview: Muniya, a chatterbox, often meets a producer who has several personal problems. However, using ingenious ways, Muniya helps the producer get rid of his personal issues.

Title: Ganesha Matthe Banda
Overview: Gayathri and Savithri, with differing outlooks on marriage, marry Shankar and Ganesha. However, Gayathri's reluctance to live with her in-laws and Savithri's obsession with Ganesha creates problems.

Title: Chaitrada Chandrama
Overview: Pankaj, a cricket player, falls in love with his classmate, Ammu, and elopes to Kashmir without playing the national level championship. Subsequently, Ammu's father asks Pankaj to prove his worth.
